Class ValidatorAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.validation.autoconfigure.ValidatorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Aware, DisposableBean, InitializingBean, ApplicationContextAware, SmartValidator, Validator
public class ValidatorAdapter extends Object implements SmartValidator, ApplicationContextAware, InitializingBean, DisposableBean
Validator implementation that delegates calls to another Validator. This Validator implements Spring's SmartValidator interface but does not implement the JSR-303 jakarta.validator.Validator interface.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Stephane Nicoll, Phillip Webb, Zisis Pavloudis

    • get

      public static Validator get(ApplicationContext applicationContext, @Nullable Validator validator)
      Return a Validator that only implements the Validator interface, wrapping it if necessary.

      If the specified Validator is not null, it is wrapped. If not, a Validator is retrieved from the context and wrapped. Otherwise, a new default validator is created.

      Parameters:
      applicationContext - the application context
      validator - an existing validator to use or null
      Returns:
      the validator to use

    • unwrap
